# cw-carousel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                   | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `arrows`   | `arrows`   | if this value is true, a button prev element and a button next element will be shown in the sides of carousel | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `autoplay` | `autoplay` | if this value is true the elments will be changed automatically in the interval defined                       | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `colors`   | `colors`   | set the colors controls carousel                                                                              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `height`   | `height`   | set the carousel height                                                                                       | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `index`    | `index`    | if this value is true, a section with control indices of elements will be shown at the bottom of the carousel | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `time`     | `time`     | set the interval for altomatically changing the elements                                                      | `number`  | `5000`      |
| `width`    | `width`    | set the carousel width                                                                                        | `string`  | `undefined` |
